title: Did a 19th-century freemason really predict World War 3 between Islam and Zionism?
summary_full: The “Pike letter,” allegedly written in 1871, is said to predict three world wars: the first to topple empires and establish communism, the second to defeat fascism and pave the way for Israel, and a third future conflict between Western and Islamic powers, leading to global upheaval and a radical transformation of religion. Its existence remains unverified, yet it continues to circulate and intrigue.
